sgcool_label_text:This cotton baju kurong has a slit neckline and does not open in the front. In late 19th century Java
 there was a large selection of materials to choose from for the making of baju panjang
 including silk
 European cotton and velvet. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a black baju kurong. It has long sleeves, a slit neckline, and does not open in the front.
metadata.sgcool_label_text: This cotton baju kurong has a slit neckline and does not open in the front. In late 19th century Java, there was a large selection of materials to choose from for the making of baju panjang, including silk, European cotton and velvet. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.
